summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of portion of the alley in block 6, Hunter's Lake Union Addition, being the alley between McGraw Street and Wheeler Street; from Bigelow Avenue to a point approximately 180 feet east of Bigelow Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9390 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
